name: The Bounty on Sammy Slaphead
description:
you are a bounty hunter (or hit man IDK) and you have to kill Sammy Slaphead

because he forgot to bring back apple sauce he borrowed (with permission)

there is more than just Sammy SlapHead in his house (well not yet the game is in early access) there is also a robot called Hum the human he be blocking your view until you leave a room if you don't he kill you
